testcase.name: Select items and validate price in cart
testcase.system-out: Given Customer logged in to pizzahut application............................passed When Customer enter location................................................passed Then Select the first option of location....................................passed And Customer validate that Vegatarian option is disabled....................passed When Customer selects pizza and added into cart.............................passed Then Customer selects drinks and add it to the cart.........................passed And Verify the price of selected pizza and drink............................passed
